text: Susanna "Susan" Kohner (born November 11, 1936) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Sarah Jane in Imitation of Life (1959), for which she was nominated for an Academy Award and won a Golden Globe award. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Susan Kohner at Internet Off-Broadway Database * Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Susan Kohner
